name: Cook the Book: Cheese and Olive Salad
description: Today's Cook the Book recipe is one that the late James Beard, "the dean of American gastronomy," recommended as a dish to serve "at a buffet party, with cold meats for luncheon, or to take on a picnic." (Of course,...
recipeIngredient: 2 cups finely chopped green onions or scallions
1 1/2 cups sliced stuffed green olives, and more for garnish
Fresh salad greens: Bibb, Boston, butter or leaf lettuce, or romain

recipeInstructions.text: Finely shred the cheese. Combine with the green onions or scallions and the sliced stuffed green olives, mixing well. Toss with the dressing, made by mixing all the dressing ingredients together. Arrange on a green nest of fresh salad greens in a salad bowl, piling the salad up nicely. Garnish with more stuffed green olives.
